title: Peach - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Romance   Supernatural   Xianxia   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Ancient China   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Bloodlines   Caring Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Childhood Love   Clever Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cultivation   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Dragons   Fairies   Fantasy World   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   God-human Relationship   Handsome Male Lead   H*ndjob   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kind Love Interests   Marriage   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Playful Protagonist   Power Couple   Royalty   S*xual Cultivation Technique   Shapeshifters   Slow Growth at Start   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Transformation Ability   Unconditional Love
author: Lu Ye Qian He   绿野千鹤
description:
It’s midsummer, and the Emperor made all his sons sleep in the temple with peaches in their mouths to fulfill an ancient rite. 

Chen Ziqi’s dream is to become a great hero who owns a chicken farm! He wants to traverse the world with sword in hand, and go home to enjoy eating chicken, drinking wine, appreciating tea and reading poetry.

It’s one thing if Chen Ziqi can’t become a great hero, but now his father Emperor wants to sacrifice him to the god?!

And speaking of this god, there seems to be something wrong with him…

God: Tweet?

A cool but cute (bird) Gong X a vengeful, petty sweet talking Shou>
